io.micronaut.configuration.lettuce.cache

Class RedisCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.lettuce.cache.RedisCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.cache.Cache<io.lettuce.core.api.StatefulConnection<?,?>>, io.micronaut.cache.SyncCache<io.lettuce.core.api.StatefulConnection<?,?>>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @EachBean(value=RedisCacheConfiguration.class)
 @Requires(classes=io.micronaut.cache.SyncCache.class)
public class RedisCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.cache.SyncCache<io.lettuce.core.api.StatefulConnection<?,?>>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    An implementation of SyncCache for Lettuce / Redis.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
